title: Declaration to take up arms - point of view

content.question: The issuing of the declaration in the excerpt best serves as evidence of the

choices.label: Patriot inclusion of abolitionism as a goal of the resistance
desire of the majority of colonists to launch offensive attacks against the British
efforts of colonists to protect their rights as English subjects
colonial demand for complete independence from Britain

content.answer: efforts of colonists to protect their rights as English subjects
